thread.title: Atlanta Falcons Pick Apart Packers, Advance To Super Bowl LI
thread.title_full: Atlanta Falcons Pick Apart Packers, Advance To Super Bowl LI

author: Kyle Rooney
title: Atlanta Falcons Pick Apart Packers, Advance To Super Bowl LI
text:
Home > Sports > Atlanta Falcons Pick Apart Packers, Advance To Super Bowl LI Atlanta Falcons Pick Apart Packers, Advance To Super Bowl LI 0 0 Posted by Kyle Rooney , Jan 22, 2017 at 06:37pm Falcons cruise in NFC Championship. 
The Atlanta Falcons are your NFC Champions and bound for Super Bowl LI. 
Matt Ryan picked apart the Green Bay Packers secondary all game, throwing for 392 yards and four touchdowns en route to an easy 44-21 victory at the Georgia Dome today. 
As a whole, Atlanta's scorching offense racked up 493 yards of offense against the Pack, 180 of which came courtesy of Julio Jones who had nine catches including an electric 73-yard score. 
The Falcons now await the winner of tonight's AFC Championship game between the Pittsburgh Steelers and New England Patriots. 
Check out some highlights from the blowout win below.
